alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Franklin (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:51AM CDT until April 20 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Franklin County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Douglas County in east central Kansas... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 251 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ottawa, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Baldwin City and Wellsville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 186 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
